Articles.Content:
Hi guys. I decided to create a Kerbal Space Program multi-part movie entitled "Loneliness."
The meaning here is very deep. I am currently 40-ish percent done with the first "chapter", so to speak.
Hope you guys like it; criticism welcome.

You can watch the trailer here:

 

Sidenote: I am aware of the text in the thumbnail being uneven. I'll fix it someday. I'm currently moving to California from New Jersey so everything will take a while.
